title: LeaverBuster
body: So I was in Low Priority Queue and it was my last one, after 20 minutes i join champ select and started the game. Few minutes later, my client crashes and disconnects. I tried reconnected and it worked but then my team remake and then it showed the message I had to wait 20 minutes for 5 games. Why did this happen? Please help :(

replies.body:
I'm sorry to hear about the issues you've been having lately. It sounds like you're experiencing an unstable connection to the game servers. I strongly recommend you work through [the connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to get your connection compatible with League.

Let me know if these steps helped.
